opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Garner v. ASHLEY FURNITURE INDUSTRIES, INC.

opinion:
548 U.S. 923 (2006)

GARNER
v.
ASHLEY FURNITURE INDUSTRIES, INC.

No. 05-507.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 30, 2006.

Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Burlington N. & S. F. R. Co. v. White, ante, p. 53.
